description:
Thanks to Hikaru`s shut-out, the Dolphins advance to the quarter finals.
Their next opponent is going to be the famous team, Touto Boys, where Urabe and Andy once played.
This powerhouse of a team`s main pillars are the left-handed ace Mayumura Michiru and her twin brother Wataru as the catcher.
The Mayumura siblings` fahter Mayumura Ken is a famous pitcher who once fought against Daigo`s dad Gorou in the World Series.
The Dolphins are visibly shaken by Michiru`s and Wataru`s oppressive presence.
Source: crunchyroll
